channel.title: Unchanged Runescape Server?
channel.description:
I'm looking for a server that hasn't had anything added to it. Preferably one with: -Wilderness -Barrows -Skill capes -Every skill up to Construction -God Wars( Possibly?)
If anyone has one or a link to one, please tell me.

item.title: Unchanged Runescape Server?
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:15, topic:235752”][quote author=xstrxpurez link=topic=310952.msg2482440#msg2482440 date=1223611096]

how about you make your own?
[/quote]if he knows how

im sure u dont either.

…nor do you.

If there was such a thing, I would almost assume it wouldn’t be released for free. If wrote something like that (which I am planning on), I am going to implement a way that only versions from this forum work correctly.

actually i can create an almost exact replica of it… but why in hell would anyone wana take over 5 months to make something that is gonna be boring as fuck.

No, you couldn’t. Nor could I.

I know more about the RuneScape protocol than you, a lot more, and in that sense, if I cannot, you obviously cannot.[/quote]

its not hard matching up the exact stuff… it will be only hard matching up the quests… and getting all the right cache from it…

Read full topic

If there was such a thing, I would almost assume it wouldn’t be released for free. If wrote something like that (which I am planning on), I am going to implement a way that only versions from this forum work correctly.

actually i can create an almost exact replica of it… but why in hell would anyone wana take over 5 months to make something that is gonna be boring as fuck.[/quote]
No, you couldn’t. Nor could I.

I know more about the RuneScape protocol than you, a lot more, and in that sense, if I cannot, you obviously cannot.

Read full topic

item.title: Unchanged Runescape Server?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“ilovelamp, post:7, topic:235752”]reaper you don’t need to be so closed minded jesus christ, obviously he probably hasn’t read the rules yet
make sure you read the rules before you post
Pleeeaaase![/quote]You should read all of the posts before quoting me. I told him politely that I know it’s his first post, and to look at the rules. I even explained where he should post this.

Then, later those two decided to bump the thread with one spam link after another. I was referring to them when i said -

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:6, topic:235752”]stfuandstopspamming.com

+reported.com[/quote] I wasn’t talking to the thread creator when i said that. I’m a nice guy.

Read full topic
